entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 2.
